item.title: escaping liquid tags with {% raw %}
about liquid tags
item.description: what i learned shopify has a github pages site documenting liquid tags which is very useful and easy to use. how i learned {% raw %} i am moving soyserg.io from a hugo site to jekyll and i couldn’t figure out how to have nested {{}} as in {{ category/{{category | downcase }} | relative_url }} which just doesn’t work. so i moved to {{ 'category/' | append: category | downcase | relative_url }} {% endraw %}
